a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from drug use disorders for 15- to 49-year olds, 1990 to
Annual deaths from drug use disorders per 100,000 people aged 15-49. This includes opioids, cocaine, amphetamine, and
cannabis. Figures do not include suicide deaths which may otherwise be related to drug use disorders.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
